original_text: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word: “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”
korean_text: 온 율법은 네 이웃 사랑하기를 네 자신 같이 하라 하신 한 말씀에서 이루어졌나니

sentences.original_text: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word:
“You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”
sentences.korean_translation: 네 이웃을 네 자신 같이 사랑하라.”
